channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.6
item.description:
This update no longer includes PostgreSQL 10 since it is no longer supported.

Do not install this update if you are still using PostgreSQL 10.

If you are still using PostgreSQL 10, please migrate your database to a newer version before installing this upgrade.

  • PostgreSQL 11.19 with PostGIS 2.5.9
  • PostgreSQL 12.14 with PostGIS 3.0.8
  • PostgreSQL 13.10 with PostGIS 3.1.8
  • PostgreSQL 14.7 with PostGIS 3.2.4
  • PostgreSQL 15.2 with PostGIS 3.3.2

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.9
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 10.22 with PostGIS 2.4.10
  • PostgreSQL 11.17 with PostGIS 2.5.7
  • PostgreSQL 12.12 with PostGIS 3.0.6
  • PostgreSQL 13.8 with PostGIS 3.1.6
  • PostgreSQL 14.5 with PostGIS 3.2.2
  • PostgreSQL 15beta3 with PostGIS 3.3.0rc1
